summary: Westyn is a Dunmer mage specializing in shock destruction and conjuration.
descriptionHtml:
Westyn is a very simple follower that I created mainly for roleplaying. I wanted a Dark Elf who tended to hang back and use ranged magic combat. You can find him hanging out in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.

[list][*]Light Foot perk[/*]
[*]Quiet Casting perk[/*]
[*]Shock, Flame Atronach, Raise Zombie, and Healing spells[/*]
[*]Essential[/*]
[*]Marriable (will open a general goods shop)[/*]
[*]will stay in the area where you dismiss him for easy retrieval later[/*]
[/list]
Westyn should be compatible with most mods, including follower mods such as AFT, as long as this file is loaded before them. He should also work with or without any of the DLC.
author: BananaDongle
